name: Irish Planning Institute
goal:
Founded in 1975, the Irish Planning Institute is the professional body representing the majority of professional planners engaged in physical, spatial and environmental planning in Ireland and Irish planners practicing overseas.

The Irish Planning Instituteâ€™s mission is to advance planning by serving, improving and promoting the planning profession for the benefit of the community and the common good.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
